Name: Colour Card Game
About the game: Welcome to Colour Card Game , the most popular Hi-Lo card game in the world established by the World Card (WC) in 2015 . The card game is based to Hi-Lo system with 13 different cards . Your target is guessed the next card if is + or - than your actual card . Feature : 3 Modes : Training , Friendly Game and Story Training : Train alone for learn the card system and try of beat your best score . Friendly Game : Try to beat one of the six main characters in the story mode in a no-stakes match . Story : A story of 13 episodes who spread on 2 years where you play a young player card talented who enter at the professionals in the World Card (WC) who has been create in 2015 . - 26 Songs for you accompanies in the different modes
